text: Next Up Criminal Minds Exclusive : The New Case Has a Startling Connection to an Old Unsub'90s kids rejoice, it's time to return to Camp Waziyatah! Bug Juice is officially returning to TV this summer, and now we have a premiere date. The revival, titled Bug Juice : My Adventures at Camp, will premiere Monday, July 16 at 7 : 30 / 6 : 30c on Disney Channel and it will continue to air on Monday and Thursday evenings after that. Disney Channel's Bug Juice originally aired from 1998 - 2001, depicting the summer camp shenanigans of a group of kids at sleep away camp for weeks at a time.
